pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions to Facilitate the Simulation of Large Scale Assessment Data // Provides functions to simulate data from large-scale educational assessments, including background questionnaire data and cognitive item responses that adhere to a multiple- matrix sampled design. The theoretical foundation can be found on Matta, T.H., Rutkowski, L., Rutkowski, D. et al. (2018) doi:10.1186/s40536-018-0068-8.
